title: CI failures in Ubuntu 22.04
body:
A few CI failures with Ubuntu 22.04 were found in https://github.com/mlflow/mlflow/pull/7203.

https://github.com/mlflow/mlflow/actions/runs/3360259811/jobs/5569231289#step:10:880

```
> devtools::install_dev_deps(dependencies = TRUE)
Error in dyn.load(file, DLLpath = DLLpath, ...) : 
  unable to load shared object '/home/runner/work/_temp/Library/stringi/libs/stringi.so':
  libicui18n.so.66: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
Calls: source ... namespaceImport -> loadNamespace -> library.dynam -> dyn.load
Execution halted
```

https://github.com/mlflow/mlflow/actions/runs/3360259808/jobs/5569232066#step:9:21

```
+ pytest tests/utils/test_model_utils.py tests/h2o tests/shap tests/paddle tests/tracking/fluent/test_fluent_autolog.py tests/autologging tests/test_mlflow_lazily_imports_ml_packages.py
```
